task: Develop a basic 'Tropico' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Lowest common denominator check - single beat - single note - single riff'.
name: Riff Republic

branding_data.short_description: Manage a musical island nation in Riff Republic, where harmony and rhythm dictate the prosperity of your people.
branding_data.detailed_description: Riff Republic is a unique city-building and management simulation game where players take on the role of a ruler in charge of an island nation driven by music. Inspired by the classic 'Tropico' series, this game introduces a twist: every decision and development must be based on a single musical element—be it a beat, note, or riff. Players must maintain the delicate balance of harmony to keep their citizens happy, infrastructure sound, and economy thriving. Construct buildings, manage resources, and orchestrate policies that resonate with the cultural pulse of your people. The game challenges players to think creatively and strategically as they develop their island with the lowest common denominator in mind—music.

strategy: Lowest common denominator check - single beat - single note - single riff
